      • createEmployee

        public void createEmployee(java.lang.String staffName,
                           java.lang.String staffRoles,
                           int hours)
                    throws ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException
        This method creates an Employee to the system
        Parameters:
        staffName - : Employee Name
        staffRoles: - Employee Staff Title
        hours: - Hours work per week
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : if parameter are null or hours is higher than 40

      • createSchedule

        public void createSchedule(java.lang.String weekday,
                           java.sql.Date date,
                           java.sql.Time startTime,
                           java.sql.Time endTime)
                    throws ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException
        This method creates a Weekly Schedule in the system
        Parameters:
        weekday - : Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
        date - : Date of the schedule
        startTime - : Beginning of work time shift
        endTime - : End of work time shift
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - :If parameters are null

      • scheduleRegister

        public void scheduleRegister(ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.model.Employee employee,
                             ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.model.Schedule schedule)
                      throws ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException
        This method registers an employee to a schedule time shift
        Parameters:
        employee - : Employee Name
        schedule - : Weekday with time and date
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : if parameter are null or is not contain in the XML file

                     throws ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException
        This method creates a new equipment in the system
        Parameters:
        equipmentName - : Name of the equipment
        equipmentQty - : Quantity of the equipment in terms of unity
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : parameter is null

      • createMenu

        public void createMenu(java.lang.String menuName,
                       ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.model.Supply foodName,
                       int ingredientQty,
                       double price)
                throws ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException
        This method creates a new menu, where the ingredient, food quantity and price are link to it.
        Parameters:
        menuName - : Menu Name
        foodName - : Ingredient included in the Menu
        ingredientQty - : Quantity per serving
        price - : Price of the Meal
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : parameter is null
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : quantity of ingredient is zero
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : Price is negative

      • createTracker

        public void createTracker(java.lang.String saleName,
                          int saleQty)
                   throws ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException
        This method creates a popularity Tracker of a Menu with the quantity sold
        Parameters:
        saleName - : Menu being Tracked
        saleQty - : Sold quantity
        Throws:
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : if parameter is null
        ca.mcgill.ecse321.FTMS.controller.InvalidInputException - : if sale quantity is zero
